com.androidhiddencamera

Class HiddenCameraFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.androidhiddencamera.HiddenCameraFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, android.arch.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, CameraCallbacks
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DemoCamFragment

    public abstract class HiddenCameraFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
implements CameraCallbacks
    Created by Keval on 27-Oct-16. This abstract class provides ability to handle background camera to the fragment in which it is extended.
    Author:
    'https://github.com/kevalpatel2106'

    • Method Detail

      • startCamera

        protected void startCamera(CameraConfig cameraConfig)
        Start the hidden camera. Make sure that you check for the runtime permissions before you start the camera.
        Parameters:
        cameraConfig - camera configuration CameraConfig

      • takePicture

        protected void takePicture()
        Call this method to capture the image using the camera you initialized. Don't forget to initialize the camera using startCamera(CameraConfig) before using this function.

      • stopCamera

        protected void stopCamera()
        Stop and release the camera forcefully.
